thread.section_title: Vacuum-Direct.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vacuum-Direct.com | vacuum-direct.com | 3 of 115
thread.title: Ann

author: Ann
title: Ann
text: I was feeling distressed when the hose of my Dyson vacuum needed replacement. I thought for sure that I was going to have to wait at least 2 weeks before I could resume taking care of my home. When I found the Vacuum - Direct website I was a little skeptical, so of course I did some research all of which came back favorable. I placed my order with them for the new hose and to my surprise it was at my door 2 days later. I will continue to use this company for any other parts that I may need in the future and I will spread the word to my friends and family as well.
